# Probability of Regulatory Function (PRF) scoring method was developed by the Gaffney group

# Data was generated by Jeremy Schwartzentruber and passed to Patrick Short on the 16th of December, 2015
# cell types:
# E002    ES-WA7 Cells
# E010    H9 Derived Neuron Cultured Cells
# E053    Cortex derived primary cultured neurospheres
# E072    Brain Inferior Temporal Lobe
# E081    Fetal Brain Male
# E082    Fetal Brain Female
# E083    Fetal Heart
# E116    GM12878 Lymphoblastoid Cells

# scores are in ../scores/ddd_unaffected_parental_alleles_CNE.merged.singlescore.txt
